mapper.select: SELECT cert.cert_id AS certificateId, c.course_id AS courseId, c.title AS courseTitle, DATE(cert.issued_at) AS issuedDate, u.name AS userName, cert.certificate_number AS certificateNumber FROM certificate cert JOIN enrollment e ON cert.enrollment_id = e.enrollment_id JOIN course c ON e.course_id = c.course_id JOIN users u ON e.user_id = u.user_id WHERE cert.cert_id = #{certificateId} AND e.user_id = #{userId} AND cert.is_approved = 'Y'
